reporting-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (Specially-Designated Contributions)

description.narrative: The Centre is focused on four objectives: - Increase the interoperability of humanitarian data through shared standards and integrated systems (data services) - Increase the trust and cooperation across organizations sharing data in humanitarian response (data policy) - Increase the capability of people to access and use data in support of humanitarian efforts (data literacy); and - Increase the number of active partners engaged with the Centre (network engagement)

The mission of the Centre is to work with partners to increase the use and impact of data in humanitarian response. The vision is to create a future where all people involved in a humanitarian situation have access to the data they need, when and how they need it, to make responsible and informed decisions.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS)

organisation.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA)

mailing-address.narrative: Fluwelen Burgwal 58, 2511 CJ, The Hague, The Netherlands

description.narrative: Proper management of donors and UNOPS

comment.narrative: Actual as of 31 December 2018. Donor reporting done.

target.value: ECHO midterm report, MFA 6-month progress report, EAA Y3 agreement, finalized new business plan for the Centre (2020-23), UNOPS FA 6, and new agreement for next phase. City narrative and financial progress report, MFA financial report, IDS financial and narrative reports, UNOPS FA (Centre project extension), RF grant agreement signed

actual.value: All requirements met on time

target.value: MFA: Liquidy report + Y3 financial plan (due 31 July) and Progress report (due 30 Sept); EAA Q2 report (due 31 July). EAA Y2 final report, EAA Y2 impact report, EAA Y3 proposal, next phase business plan for the Centre (2020-23).

actual.value: Donor reports submitted to MFA on time; additional information provided to MFA on Liquidity report as requested. Last tranches of funding requested and received from MFA and City. EAA Y2 final report, EAA Y2 impact report and EAA Y3 proposal submitted; next phase business plan for the Centre (2020-23) developed and City agreement finalized.

target.value: EAA 4th quarter report by 31 Jan; MFA progress progress report and financial update; City of the Hague: Activity report and financial report; new FA with UNOPS

actual.value: EAA 4th quarter report submitted on time; MFA: Financial report (for 2018) submitted late on 28 June; City: Activity report and financial report delivered April 30; New FA signed with UNOPS
